room_title: Escape room "MacGregor Manor" by Game On Escapes & More in Raleigh - Durham
review: Lots of fun for our group of 6. Tricky, scary, challenging, adventurous good time! We will be back to defeat the jungle!

room_title: Escape room "MacGregor Manor" by Game On Escapes & More in Raleigh - Durham
review: This was my first in an escape room. We tried the cursed house theme and had an absolute blast. The guys working there were awesome and very friendly. I would highly recommend this place.

room_title: Escape room "MacGregor Manor" by Game On Escapes & More in Raleigh - Durham
review: We had a blast escaping MacGregor Manor! The room was well thought out with unique puzzles to solve. The staff was awesome. I definitely look forward to new rooms!

room_title: Escape room "MacGregor Manor" by Game On Escapes & More in Raleigh - Durham
review: Weâ€™ve done several rooms and The Manor was, by far the funnest and exciting one to date. It was challenging but kept you really engaged and had a few surprises. Loved it!

room_title: Escape room "MacGregor Manor" by Game On Escapes & More in Raleigh - Durham
review: The MacGregor's Manor was awesome. It was for some reason surprisingly scary. It's up there for one of the most scary escape rooms we've done(We don't do scary rooms often). It was well themed and all the puzzles made sense for what it was used for. Ish had a bunch of fun being our game master. It was a good marry of physical puzzles and electronic puzzles. It was a challenge with everything going on but we got out safe and sound from the manor.
